faction_profile.name: 남궁세가 (Namgung Family / 南宮世家)
alias: Leader of the Five Families (오대세가의 수장)

base_options: Mt. Hwang (Yellow Mountain / 황산) - Traditional setting.
Hefei (합비 / 合肥) - City setting (Common in modern Wuxia for realism).
location.significance: Located centrally, symbolizing their central role in the Murim Alliance.

status.rank: No.1 of the Five Great Families.
status.political_role: Often holds the position of Murim Alliance Leader (Murim-Maengju).

appearance: Produces the most handsome men and beautiful women.
Young talents often claim spots in the 'Seven Dragons Five Phoenixes' (칠룡오봉).
personality: High pride (can be depicted as arrogance).
Obsessed with the 'Emperor' (Je-wang) imagery – dominating and retreating is not an option.

combat_style.concept: Majestic and Overwhelming. Crushing the enemy with the aura of a ruler.

list.name: 천뢰제왕신공 (Heavenly Thunder Emperor Divine Art)
list.effect: Imbues attacks with the power of lightning and a ruler's aura.

list.name: 창궁대연신공 (Blue Sky Great Expansion Divine Art)

sword_arts.style: The Ruler's Sword (No retreat, heavy strikes)

list.name: 제왕검형 (Emperor Sword Form)
list.description: Signature Ultimate. Unfolding heavy, majestic strikes. Never retreats.

list.name: 창궁무애검법 (Blue Sky Limitless Sword)
list.description: Artistic sword art manifesting blue Sword Flux (Geom-gang). Cuts evil Qi.

list.name: 천풍제왕검법 (Heaven Wind Emperor Sword)
list.description: Combines majesty with wind speed. Projectiles wind blades (Sword Wind).

list: 천리호정 (Thousand Li Household Courtyard) - Shrinking distance.

formations: 대창궁무애검진 (Great Blue Sky Limitless Sword Formation)

narrative_role: The golden standard that the protagonist must surpass.
The 'Student Council President' of the Murim world.
Sometimes portrayed as hypocrites who use 'Righteousness' to hide greed.
A powerful ally whose name alone deters minor villains.
